title: Ageha wo Ou Monotachi
original_name: アゲハを追うモノたち
sinopse: Galactic Calendar year 2039, Mars. Shiraishi Ageha is sentenced to death because of her being accused of killing four people. Kisaragi Ayako is the chief of prison where she's locked up and the man who is guarding her is Kenzaki Kyousuke. A story about finding the truth.
